original_text: On the seventh day of the feast, King Xerxes was feeling happy, because he had drunk so much wine. He had seven eunuchs who served him in the palace. Their names were Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha, Abagtha, Zethar and Carcas.
korean_text: 제칠일에 왕이 주흥이 일어나서 어전 내시 므후만과 비스다와 하르보나와 빅다와 아박다와 세달과 가르가스 일곱 사람을 명령하여

sentences.original_text: On the seventh day of the feast,
because he had drunk so much wine.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너무 많은 포도주를 마셨기 때문이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: who served him in the palace.
Their names were Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 이름은 메후만, 비스다, 하르보나, 빅다였고,
